# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty fetch subscriptions operation.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

You must set the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchSubscriptionsOperation/subscriptionIDs-714ct] property before you execute the operation.

## Creating a Fetch Subscriptions Operation

- **init(subscriptionIDs:)**: Creates an operation for fetching the specified subscriptions.
